package.description: Quick overhead grasping for the PR2. Objects are percieved using the tabletop_object_detector package and grasped from above using interpolated IK, modified to keep the elbows up. Collisions with either the object or table are detected by monitoring all senses available on the arms. When a collision is detected, the gripper closes and returns to its initial grasping position. Functionality is also provided to implement the laser_interface package, allowing a user to control the manipulation using a laser pointer.
package.author: Kelsey Hawkins, Advisor: Prof. Charlie Kemp (Healthcare Robotics Lab at Georgia Tech)
